item.title: 美联储戴利表示，战胜通胀的信心正在增强
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，"信心正在增强"，通胀率正朝着美国中央银行设定的 2% 的目标迈进，这是决策者为降息设定的门槛。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Monday said "confidence is growing" that inflation is heading toward the U.S. central bank's 2% goal, the bar that policymakers have set for cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 阿根廷平行比索因新经济措施而走强，股票指数大幅下跌
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政府于上周末推出的新经济措施生效后，阿根廷平行市场比索兑美元汇率周一升值，而当地股市则受到影响。【原文：The Argentine parallel market peso appreciated against the U.S. dollar on Monday while the local stock market suffered, after new economic measures introduced by President Javier Milei's government over the weekend took effect.】

item.title: 鲍威尔表示将留任美联储主席直至任期结束
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周一表示，他没有计划在任期届满前离开美国央行行长的职位，这给一些忠于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的人的断言泼了一盆冷水，这些人认为，如果前总统重新入主白宫，鲍威尔将很快失业。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Monday said he has no plans to leave his post as head of the U.S. central bank before his term expires, pouring cold water on assertions by some loyalists to Donald Trump that Powell would be swiftly out of a job should the former president regain the White House.】

item.title: 业内人士称，现货以太坊 ETF 可能于 7 月 23 日开始交易
item.description: 据三位业内人士透露，美国监管机构已告知申请推出与全球第二大加密货币以太币价格挂钩的交易所交易基金的八家公司中的至少三家，他们可能会在下周二（7 月 23 日）最终批准新产品的推出。【原文：US regulators have told at least three of the eight firms applying to launch exchange-traded funds tied to the price of ether, the world's second-largest cryptocurrency, that they are likely to give the final go-ahead for the new products to launch next Tuesday, July 23, according to three industry sources.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，迪士尼内部通信在黑客攻击后泄露到网上
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，华特迪士尼内部 Slack 工作场所协作系统的数据已在网上泄露，其中包括关于广告活动、工作室技术和面试人选的讨论。【原文：Data from Walt Disney's internal Slack workplace collaboration system have been leaked online, including discussions about ad campaigns, studio technology and interview candidates, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金对软件公司的押注创历史新低，摩根士丹利称
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在一份报告中称，在科技行业出现大范围抛售之后，全球对冲基金上周对美国软件股的投资达到了 "多年来的新低"。【原文：Global hedge funds' exposure to software stocks in the U.S. reached "new multi-year lows" last week after a broader sell-off in the technology sector, Morgan Stanley said in a note.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称赞通胀问题取得进展
item.description: 美联储主席鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周一表示，今年第二季度的三个美国通胀读数确实 "在一定程度上增加了人们的信心"，即物价上涨的步伐正在以可持续的方式回到美联储的目标，这番话表明，转向降息可能为时不远。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Monday the three U.S. inflation readings over the second quarter of this year do "add somewhat to confidence" that the pace of price increases is returning to the Fed's target in a sustainable fashion, remarks that suggest a turn to interest rate cuts may not be far off.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司前首席执行官肯尼斯-德尔去世，享年 87 岁
item.description: 雪佛龙公司周一表示，该公司前董事长兼首席执行官肯尼斯-T-德尔（Kenneth T. Derr）在家人的陪伴下于周五去世，享年 88 岁。【原文：Former Chevron Corp chairman and CEO Kenneth T. Derr, who led the company between 1989 and 1999, died on Friday shortly before his 88th birthday surrounded by his family, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔表示将留任整个主席任期
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周一表示，他一定会完成本届央行领导人的全部任期。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Monday he will definitely finish the full scope of his current central bank leadership term.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔：最新通胀读数处于 "相当不错的位置
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周一表示，今年第二季度的三个通胀读数显示，在使物价上涨速度回归美联储目标方面正在取得 "更多进展"。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Monday the three inflation readings over the second quarter of this year showed "more progress" was being made on bringing the pace of price increases back to the Fed's target.】

item.title: 尽管有降息预期，加拿大企业仍在控制投资
item.description: 加拿大银行周一在其第二季度调查报告中称，加拿大企业预计明年利率将下降多达 100 个基点，但由于需求前景疲软，企业的投资意愿低于平均水平。【原文：Canadian businesses expect interest rates to come down by as much as 100 basis points over the next year but their willingness to invest is below average due to a weak demand outlook, the Bank of Canada said on Monday in its second-quarter survey.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现 6 月份信贷拒绝率上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一公布的最新数据显示，6月份的信贷拒绝率高于2024年早些时候的水平，但略低于一年前的水平。【原文：Credit rejection rates were higher in June than earlier in 2024 but slightly lower than a year ago, new data from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国法官制定快速日程表，审议家属对波音认罪协议的反对意见
item.description: 一名美国法官周一确定了一个快速日程表，以考虑在两起致命的 737 MAX 坠毁事故中遇难者的亲属对司法部与波音公司达成的认罪协议的反对意见。【原文：A U.S. judge on Monday set a fast schedule to consider the objections of relatives of those killed in two fatal 737 MAX crashes to the Justice Department's plea deal with Boeing .】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司股价创历史新高
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）的股价周一创下历史新高，反映出投资者对沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的公司充满信心。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway's share price hit a record high on Monday, reflecting investors' confidence in Warren Buffett's company, often regarded as a microcosm of the broader American economy.】

item.title: 尽管有降息预期，加拿大企业仍在控制投资计划
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee【原文：By Promit Mukherjee】

item.title: RTX 单位普惠公司完成发动机升级的初步设计审查
item.description: RTX 公司的普拉特-惠特尼公司（Pratt & Whitney）周一表示，该公司已经完成了发动机升级的初步设计审查，以提高 F-35 战斗机所有三种型号的耐用性和性能。【原文：RTX Corp's Pratt & Whitney said on Monday it has completed the preliminary design review for an engine upgrade to increase durability and performance in all three variants of the F-35 fighter jet.】

item.title: 航空资本公司敲定 35 架波音 737 MAX 喷气式飞机订单
item.description: 航空资本集团（Aviation Capital Group）周一表示，该公司已确定订购 35 架波音 737 MAX 喷气式飞机。【原文：Aircraft lessor Aviation Capital Group has finalized an order for 35 Boeing 737 MAX jets, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 优步在英国法院赢得对竞争对手应用程序征税的上诉被推翻
item.description: 周一，法院推翻了关于私人出租运营商与乘客签订合同的裁决，优步（Uber）的竞争对手出租车运营商在伦敦以外地区的利润率将不会面临 20% 的税费。【原文：Uber's rival taxi operators will not face a 20% tax charge on their profit margins outside of London after a court on Monday overturned a ruling that private-hire operators enter into a contract with passengers.】

item.title: KKR 支持的 OneStream 在美国首次公开募股中寻求 43.8 亿美元估值
item.description: OneStream Software 由私募股权公司 KKR 支持，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值约为 43.8 亿美元。【原文：OneStream Software, which is backed by private equity firm KKR , is targeting a valuation of about $4.38 billion in its U.S. initial public offering.】

item.title: 券商上调标普 500 指数目标，寄望软着陆和降息
item.description: 受经济 "软着陆 "预期和美联储今年降息可能性增大的刺激，券商纷纷上调美股基准 S&P 500 指数的年底目标。【原文：Brokerages have raised their year-end targets for U.S. stocks benchmark S&P 500 , spurred by expectations of a "soft landing" for the economy and growing odds the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 梅西百货终止与 Arkhouse 和 Brigade 的讨论
item.description: 梅西百货公司周一表示，已终止与 Arkhouse Management 和 Brigade Capital 的讨论，理由是收购这家连锁百货公司的修订方案缺乏融资的确定性，也没有提供令人信服的价值。【原文：Macy's said on Monday it has terminated discussions with Arkhouse Management and Brigade Capital, citing that the revised proposal to buy the department store chain lacks certainty of financing and does not provide compelling value.】

item.title: 欧洲需要独立于中国的关键矿产定价方式，该组织称
item.description: 一个由欧盟资助的小组的负责人说，欧洲需要一个不依赖中国的系统来确定能源转型所需的关键矿产的价格，而中国在全球能源转型领域占据着主导地位。【原文：Europe needs a system to set prices for critical minerals needed for the energy transition that is not dependent on China, which dominates much of the global sector, the head of an EU-funded group said.】

item.title: 数据公司称亚马逊 "Prime Day "销售额将达到创纪录的 140 亿美元
item.description: 据研究电子商务交易数据的 Adobe Analytics 公司预测，在本周亚马逊的 Prime Day 两天购物活动期间，购物者可能会花费大约 140 亿美元。【原文：Shoppers are likely to spend roughly $14 billion during Amazon's Prime Day two-day shopping event this week, according to projections from Adobe Analytics, a firm that studies e-commerce transaction data.】

item.title: 经济萎靡不振，欧洲企业纷纷裁员
item.description: 通胀水平的升高和乌克兰战争的影响迫使欧洲各地的公司冻结招聘或裁员。【原文：Elevated levels of inflation and the impact of the war in Ukraine have forced companies across Europe to freeze hiring or cut jobs.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称苹果是人工智能领域的 "最佳选择 "后，苹果公司股价上涨
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）上调了这家 iPhone 制造商的目标股价，并将该股列为 "最佳选择"，理由是该公司的人工智能努力将促进设备销售，苹果公司的股价周一上涨了约 2%。【原文：Apple's shares rose about 2% on Monday after Morgan Stanley raised its price target on the iPhone maker's shares and designated the stock as a "top pick," citing the company's AI efforts as a boost to device sales.】

item.title: 高盛因债务承销和固定收益交易强劲而利润大增
item.description: 高盛第二季度的利润增长了一倍多，主要得益于债务承销费用的增加和固定收益交易业务的强劲表现。【原文：Goldman Sachs' profit more than doubled in the second quarter, bolstered by higher fees from debt underwriting and a strong performance in its fixed-income trading business.】

item.title: AutoNation 预计 CDK 故障将影响第二季度利润
item.description: 美国汽车零售商 AutoNation 周一表示，由于零售技术提供商 CDK 在 6 月份的一次网络攻击造成的干扰，该公司第二季度的利润预计将受到每股 1.50 美元的冲击，而 6 月份正是汽车经销商的关键销售期。【原文：U.S. auto retailer AutoNation said on Monday it expects a $1.50 per share hit to its second-quarter profit due to the disruptions caused by a cyberattack at retail technology provider CDK in June, a crucial selling period for car dealers.】

item.title: 美国进口商对 10,000 美元集装箱运费率的回归表示反对
item.description: 将一个标准的 40 英尺集装箱内的玩具、汽车零部件或其他货物从上海运到纽约的成本已跃升至近 10,000 美元，这加剧了进口商的挫败感，并促使一些专家认为市场正处于泡沫之中。【原文：The cost to ship a standard 40-foot container of toys, auto parts or other goods from Shanghai to New York has jumped to nearly $10,000, fueling frustration among importers and prompting some experts to say the market is in a bubble.】

item.title: 法国竞争管理机构确认对英伟达展开调查
item.description: 法国竞争管理机构周一证实，正在对芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）涉嫌反竞争的行为进行调查。【原文：The French competition authority confirmed on Monday that an investigation is underway into chipmaker Nvidia over alleged anti-competitive practices.】

item.title: SolarEdge Technologies 将裁员 400 人
item.description: SolarEdge Technologies 周一表示，公司将裁员 400 人，以恢复盈利能力并确保财务稳定。【原文：SolarEdge Technologies said on Monday it would lay off 400 employees, as it works to restore profitability and ensure financial stability.】
